data.text: Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛni mà: «Kokolo gola ɠila seɠe, è sɛʋɛi ɠɛ ma, gaaɠula ga: ‹Toosui maaɓuɠaa, kɔɔzoganii maa la ɠoozani›.»
Gè kokologi lɛɛni ga zeele felegɔ, nu a la ti la, zalaɠa ɠula nui Ilii ta Yebelekiya ná-doun zunui Zakali.

Gè ʋilɛni ànzai ʋolu, GALA goo wo anzanui, é kogi zeɠeni, é doun zunu zɔlɔɔni. Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠɛni mà: «Toli ga Maɠɛle-Salale-Ɠase-Baze (nii poluʋɛ ga «toosui maaɓuɠaa, kɔɔzoganii maa la ɠoozani»).
Mazɔlɔɔ aisa doungoi ʋa zoo ɠɛɛzu ‹Dèe› ɓaa ‹Kɛ̀ɛ›, Damase naavoloiti pɛ ta li Asiili masagi ʋɔ bɛ, ta kɔɔzoganiiti ti zosu Samali.»
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɓɔɛni pɔ̀ mɔnɔ, é ɠɛ mà:
«Tɔɔzei niima nuɓusɛiti ti Silowe ɗɛi ʋɛlɛʋilini,
naa maaʋele ma, wɛlɛ Maliɠii ɠa ʋaazu ga ziɛ wolai ti laalɔɠɔma, ti ɠeɠaaɓaai,
toɠa ɠaaʋote Zuda yooi ma,
Nuɓusɛiti, à zɔngɔi wo, kɛlɛ fɔnigi ɠa wo wo ma!
À faazeikpasuiti kɛ, ti pɛ ta ɠoloɠolo!
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa mà,
«À mina naati pɛ daasei pɛɛ ga yaavai,
À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, Fai-Pɛ-Maliɠii ɠwɛɛ ga ɲadegɛ,
Toɠa ga seizu ɲadegai,
Ma mɔinmɔin kɔɠɔi ɠa ziɠa ba,
Zeele wooi makɛ,
Kìtogɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa,
Giya ɠaa, gá dointi Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ti veai zèa,
Siɛgi zu ta ɠɛna la wo ma:
wa ti wooɠaaʋote ga:
Toɠa leʋe zooi zu, kpɔlɔi ta pului ma.
Naa ʋolu é wɛlɛ zooi ʋɔ pelei,
Kɛlɛ kpidii la yɛga ɠɔ naama yooi zu,
